reviews.text: As with all Formule 1s, this hotel in Narbonne is extremely clean, tidy and very functional. Value for money is excellent. The hotel is located in a big commercial zone on a main road into Narbonne which takes around 10minutes by bus. The nearest bus stop is about a 5 minute walk. Formule 1s offer a great deal on an evening meal at a Courtepaille restaurant and there is one right next to this hotel.
reviews.title: Functional
